code: import React from"react";import"./Notifications.css";import{getLatestNotification}from"./utils";import closeIcon from"./close-icon.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Notifications=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Notifications",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Here is the list of notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{position:"absolute",top:"12px",right:"12px",border:"none",background:"none",padding:"0"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:closeIcon,onClick:()=>console.log("Close button has been clicked"),alt:"close icon",className:"close-icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"default",children:"New course available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",children:"New resume available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:getLatestNotification()}})]})]});};export default Notifications;
